sentences.en: Demon cat and dopey dog are dashing into the roadway.
sentences.cn: 这只精猫和傻狗正冲向马路.

sentences.en: Don't stop on the roadway ; move in to the side.
sentences.cn: 别在车行道上停留; 到边上来.

sentences.en: He began to cross the roadway towards me.
sentences.cn: 他开始穿过车道向我走来.

sentences.en: His drive hit a tree and caromed off into a roadway.
sentences.cn: 他击出的球撞到一棵树上而反弹到路上.

sentences.en: Marks in the roadway seem to indicate that he skidded taking a sharp turn.
sentences.cn: 从车道上的痕迹来看，他似乎在急转弯时打滑了。

sentences.en: Methods for stress control in the roof are analyzed for roadway maintenance.
sentences.cn: 分析了各种巷道维护的顶部应力控制法.

sentences.en: Physical, mechanical and time - dependent behaviour of the rocks surrounding the roadway.
sentences.cn: (县)物理, 机械和时光依附行为的岩石巷道四周.

sentences.en: Roadway heading is the forerunner for clearly knowing coal bed geological conditions.
sentences.cn: 掘进巷道是全面、准确了解矿井煤层地质条件的先导.

sentences.en: The approach ramp is a double deck roadway structure.
sentences.cn: 该引桥坡道是双层公路桥.

sentences.en: The center tramway portion depresses below the roadway elevation.
sentences.cn: 中间电车道落低到车行道以下.

sentences.en: The collision sent the car spinning across the roadway.
sentences.cn: 那辆汽车被撞得转向而横在路上.

sentences.en: The destructive reasons and countermeasures of bolting and shotcreting roadway are discussed.
sentences.cn: 论述了锚喷巷道的破坏原因并提出了对策.

sentences.en: The roadway excavation and supporting are crucial techniques in mining engineering.
sentences.cn: 巷道掘进与支护是采矿工程的技术关键.

sentences.en: The roadway to the school is narrowed by more and more stalls.
sentences.cn: 到学校的那条路由于建起了许多小商店变得越来越窄了.

sentences.en: Their use made the design of roadway surrounding rock supporting safer.
sentences.cn: 这些结果的应用使巷道岩石支护的设计更趋于安全.

words.tran_cn: 适于行驶的；适合道路上使用的
道路；路面；[公路]车行道；铁路的路基

trans.tran_en: the part of the road used by vehicles
